diff_hunk:

+namespace at { namespace native {
+
+Tensor embedding(const Tensor & weight, const Tensor & indices,
+                 int64_t padding_idx, bool scale_grad_by_freq, bool sparse) {
+  auto indices_arg = TensorArg(indices, "indices", 1);
+  checkScalarType("embedding", indices_arg, kLong);
+  checkContiguous("embedding", indices_arg);
body: previously, we would set these to contiguous if they weren't; should we do that in the functional call for backwards compat?
